text:
Busy Philipps is freaking out over being mistaken for White House Press Secretary Sarah Huckabee Sanders.

On Thursday, Jon Cooper, chairman of the Democratic Coalition Against Trump, wrote on Twitter, “Sarah Huckabee Sanders even looked habitually pissed when she was a teenager! I guess having @GovMikeHuckabee as your dad does that to you.”

The problem is, the picture he shared was of Philipps’ on Freaks and Geeks. In Judd Apatow and Paul Feig’s short-lived NBC series, the actress played Kim Kelly, the rebellious on-and-off girlfriend of Daniel Desario (James Franco).

Sarah Huckabee Sanders even looked habitually pissed when she was a teenager! I guess having @GovMikeHuckabee as your dad does that to you. pic.twitter.com/3SRzj3gIcU — Jon Cooper (@joncoopertweets) September 14, 2017

The mistake soon made its way onto Philipps timeline, and she quickly took notice, tweeting, “ARE YOU F—ING KIDDING ME? IS THIS A JOKE? THIS IS ME FROM FREAKS AND GEEKS. FAKE NEWS.”

ARE YOU FUCKING KIDDING ME? IS THIS A JOKE? THIS IS ME FROM FREAKS AND GEEKS. FAKE NEWS. https://t.co/3l8WVntlG3 — Busy Philipps (@Busyphilipps25) September 14, 2017

Her all-caps tirade didn’t end there. “ALSO I LOOK NOTHING LIKE SARAH HUCKABEE SANDERS. WHAT IN THE ACTUAL?!?????!!!!!” She continued, “I AM NEVER GETTING OVER THIS. I AM ACTUALLY DEAD NOW.”

ALSO I LOOK NOTHING LIKE SARAH HUCKABEE SANDERS. WHAT IN THE ACTUAL -?!?????!!!!! https://t.co/3l8WVntlG3 — Busy Philipps (@Busyphilipps25) September 14, 2017

I AM NEVER GETTING OVER THIS. I AM ACTUALLY DEAD NOW https://t.co/3l8WVntlG3 — Busy Philipps (@Busyphilipps25) September 14, 2017

For her final point, Philipps concluded, “ALSO. Pick on a woman for the insane lies she tells. Not cause she looks pissed while telling them. I love women who look pissed off.”

ALSO. Pick on a woman for the insane lies she tells. Not cause she looks pissed off while telling them. I love women who look pissed off. — Busy Philipps (@Busyphilipps25) September 14, 2017

When alerted to his error, Cooper initially seemed to dismiss the possibility that the photo was of Philipps. (NOTE: The photo of Philipps is the first image to appear in a Google Image search of “Sarah Huckabee as teen.”) But, eventually realizing he was wrong, he tried his best to apologize to Philipps by repeatedly declaring that he “loved” her on the ABC comedy Cougar Town, where she starred opposite Courteney Cox for six seasons. (No word on what he thought of Dawson’s Creek.)

Read his full defense below.

Wait…do you really think that's a pic of @Busyphilipps25? She's awesome! I loved her in Cougar Town!! ❤️ — Jon Cooper (@joncoopertweets) September 14, 2017

Wow – thanks for pointing that out! I heard of that show but never watched it myself. I do agree that Busy is an wonderful actress! 😀 — Jon Cooper (@joncoopertweets) September 14, 2017

I missed watching Freaks and Geeks (although my kids loved it!). I found that pic online & it was identified as being Sarah Sanders. My bad! — Jon Cooper (@joncoopertweets) September 15, 2017

I'm indeed a HUGE fan of Busy! She was my favorite character on Cougar Town (tho I did miss watching Freaks and Geeks). Anyway, I APOLOGIZE! — Jon Cooper (@joncoopertweets) September 15, 2017
title: Busy Philipps loses it after being mistaken for a young Sarah Huckabee Sanders

meta_data.description: The actress freaked out when a photo of her on 'Freaks and Geeks' was being identified as the White House press secretary.
meta_data.keywords: Busy Philipps, Sarah Huckabee Sanders, Freaks and Geeks
meta_data.news_keywords: Busy Philipps, Sarah Huckabee Sanders, Freaks and Geeks

og.title: Busy Philipps Loses It After Being Mistaken for a Young Sarah Huckabee Sanders in 'Freaks and Geeks' Photo
og.description: ‘Freaks and Geeks and Future White House Press Secretary’
